description: This is a shell script for testing and managing OCI containers, providing functions to start, stop, list, and execute commands within containers via curl RPC calls.

methods.name: start_container_from_bundle
methods.description: Starts an OCI container from a specified bundle directory or tarball.

methods.name: start_container_from_spec
methods.description: Starts a container from a Dobby JSON specification.

methods.name: stop_container
methods.description: Stops a running container by container ID.

methods.name: get_container_info
methods.description: Retrieves information about a specific container.

methods.name: get_container_state
methods.description: Gets the current state of a container.

methods.name: execute_command
methods.description: Executes a command within a container with optional parameters.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main function to read user input and invoke commands accordingly.
